Title: Persécution
Actors: Romain Duris, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Jean-Hugues Anglade, Gilles Cohen
Plot: The solitary Daniel and Sonia share an uneasy love/hate relationship. Daniel's life is disrupted by the appearance of a stranger that proceeds to insinuate himself in his life. The man's persistence takes its toll on Daniel and Sonia, leaving Daniel alone with nagging questions of "Why?"
